data.eml:eml: A new species of Homidia from China, and description of the dorsal chaetotaxy of all Chinese Homidia species (Collembola: Entomobryidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jia, Shao-Bo, Zhang, Yu-Ping, Zhao, Yan, Jordana, Rafael (2010): A new species of Homidia from China, and description of the dorsal chaetotaxy of all Chinese Homidia species (Collembola: Entomobryidae). Zootaxa 2683: 23-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.199381
